job_details.Functieomschrijving:
The AI Team is part of a larger Methodology & Analytics Team that helps create new innovative solutions for our analysts worldwide. We are looking for someone to join our AI Team and help us develop innovative cloud applications for market research clients. If you identify yourself as an AI Engineer, Machine Learning Engineer or Data Scientist and you like the idea of building cloud applications that leverage AI, then this job might be for you!

   As an AI Engineer, you will play a crucial role in the growing and dynamic team. Specifically, you will:

   Research & Develop
     * Develop deep learning powered AI, especially LLM applications tailored for market research clients
     * Support the development of interactive dashboards
     * Work with LLM providers, such as OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, etc.
     * Work with various cloud services, particularly AWS (EC2, ECS, Lambda, etc.).
     * Collaborate closely with AI specialists, cloud experts and stakeholders to deliver robust, scalable solutions.

   Guide & Lead
     * Continuously learn more about business applications and propose innovative AI solutions to address business challenges. Taking the initiative is expected.
     * Stay up to date with the latest AI and LLM developments.
     * Help us develop internal trainings on AI/ML.
job_details.full_text:
AI Engineer

The AI Team is part of a larger Methodology & Analytics Team that helps create new innovative solutions for our analysts worldwide. We are looking for someone to join our AI Team and help us develop innovative cloud applications for market research clients. If you identify yourself as an AI Engineer, Machine Learning Engineer or Data Scientist and you like the idea of building cloud applications that leverage AI, then this job might be for you!

   As an AI Engineer, you will play a crucial role in the growing and dynamic team. Specifically, you will:

   Research & Develop
     * Develop deep learning powered AI, especially LLM applications tailored for market research clients
     * Support the development of interactive dashboards
     * Work with LLM providers, such as OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, etc.
     * Work with various cloud services, particularly AWS (EC2, ECS, Lambda, etc.).
     * Collaborate closely with AI specialists, cloud experts and stakeholders to deliver robust, scalable solutions.

   Guide & Lead
     * Continuously learn more about business applications and propose innovative AI solutions to address business challenges. Taking the initiative is expected.
     * Stay up to date with the latest AI and LLM developments.
     * Help us develop internal trainings on AI/ML.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes developing deep learning powered AI, specifically LLM applications, and working with LLM providers. It also mentions building cloud applications that leverage AI and collaborating with AI specialists, aligning strongly with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.

phrases: Develop deep learning powered AI, especially LLM applications tailored for market research clients
Work with LLM providers, such as OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, etc.
job_tasks.justification: These phrases directly relate to the development and application of AI models, particularly large language models (LLMs), which is a core component of the Modeling task.

phrases: help us develop innovative cloud applications for market research clients
Support the development of interactive dashboards
deliver robust, scalable solutions
job_tasks.justification: The description highlights building cloud applications, developing dashboards, and delivering scalable solutions, which are all key aspects of software development, especially when integrating AI features.

phrases: Work with various cloud services, particularly AWS (EC2, ECS, Lambda, etc.)
job_tasks.justification: Mentioning specific cloud services like AWS EC2, ECS, and Lambda indicates involvement in the operational aspects of deploying and managing applications, which falls under Operations Engineering.

phrases: tailored for market research clients
Continuously learn more about business applications and propose innovative AI solutions to address business challenges.
job_tasks.justification: The role requires understanding client needs in market research and proposing AI solutions to business challenges, indicating a need for business understanding.

phrases: Continuously learn more about business applications
Stay up to date with the latest AI and LLM developments.
Help us develop internal trainings on AI/ML.
job_tasks.justification: The emphasis on continuous learning, staying updated with AI/LLM developments, and developing training materials directly reflects the need for learning and adaptability.

phrases: help us develop innovative cloud applications
propose innovative AI solutions
Taking the initiative is expected.
job_tasks.justification: Phrases like 'innovative cloud applications', 'propose innovative AI solutions', and 'Taking the initiative is expected' highlight the expectation for innovation and ownership.

phrases: Collaborate closely with AI specialists, cloud experts and stakeholders
job_tasks.justification: The requirement to collaborate closely with various teams and stakeholders points to the importance of communication and collaboration skills.

phrases: Continuously learn more about business applications
Stay up to date with the latest AI and LLM developments.
innovative cloud applications
propose innovative AI solutions
Taking the initiative is expected.
Collaborate closely with AI specialists, cloud experts and stakeholders
